DOC.detailed_description: Prior kinematic capture , patient select study receive 20 session NMES therapy , twice week , 10 week duration . The strengthening session plus train prior kinematic study movement strategy objective condition paretic muscle functional activity . Twenty session divide 10 session strengthen 10 session functional training reach grasp assisted electrical stimulation . The strengthening session consist 20 minute electrical stimulation triceps , extensor carpus radialis longus , extensor digitorum communis , lumbricalis , flexor digitorum superficialis opponens pollicis muscle . The functional training session perform movement reach palmar grasp NMES several cylindrical conical object different weight ( 30 minute session ) . The NMES use facilitate movement reach ( triceps muscle ) , open ( extensor carpus radialis longus extensor digitorum communis muscle ) , position ( extensor carpus radialis longus , flexor digitorum superficialis lumbricalis muscle ) , palmar grasp ( extensor carpus radialis longus , flexor digitorum superficialis , opponens pollicis muscle ) releasing ( extensor carpus radialis longus extensor digitorum communis muscle ) . Since temporal organization vary among tetraplegics , required time stage sequence . For NMES , eight-channel stimulator , control microcomputer use pulse frequency , 25 Hz ; pulse duration , 300 millisecond ; on/off duration 2/2sec ; maximum pulse width fix 250 microampere , amplitude individually adjust achieve excitability threshold muscle . The amplitude adjust throughout training , order produce desire muscle contraction . This parameter use therapy kinematic assessment . The stimulation apply self-adhesive surface electrode tap skin . They instruct reach grasp three different cylinder ( object A :200g weight , 115 mm height , 40 mm diameter ; object B : 270g , 115 mm e 50 mm ; object C : 480g , 115 mm e 60 mm ) , one time bring initial hand position .
